replies.body:
** and the fiery, monstrous "Battlecast" army (starring Creator Viktor and his mechanized mutations of Kog'Maw, Vel'Koz, Cho'Gath, Urgot, and Skarner).** That moment when riot disregards poor battlecast xerath. 
Edit: Um I was making a joke people xD this had nothing to do about whether or not he has gotten skins since obviously Guardian of the sands came out recently.
Rofl its true they forgot that champion.
He did get a recent skin during the guardian of the sands. Unlike poor karthus and olaf who haven't seen skins in 2 years or something.
how i feel when i play karthus and go to pick my skin {{champion:30}} {{item:3070}}
Lock in Statue of Karthus, spam the eagle screech.
{{champion:83}} This poor guy hasn't gotten a new skin since he was released over 4 years ago.
Is {{champion:83}} a skill?

The champ that never sees the free champ rotation...
{{champion:83}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Gotta say Great job on the skin set, but all the skins seems to be around the range of red to yellow, I felt that a variation of color like the purple/pink Fiora really made a difference, so why not more color variations like blue and green?

I always thought the colors reflected the psyche and morality of the individual... {{champion:11}} / {{champion:89}} are always pushing for the greater good so they are yellow, {{champion:236}} / {{champion:157}} are neutral in all but a few conflicts so they are orange, {{champion:238}} is represents chaotic evil so he is red, and {{champion:114}} represents chaotic good so she is pink.

Since when was zed a chaotic EVIL? His lore makes him off as a guy who just wanted to impress his master and ended up making a terrible mistake instead... I feel like he is more a chaotic neutral. A chaotic evil is well... evil, zed was never really outwardly evil, selfish and generally a bad guy yes, but never evil. At risk of ranting on this is what really pissed me off about the Xerath lore rework in the Shurima event last year. They turned him from a neutral who was trying to live with his own mistakes into the stereotypical bad guy role where he was painted an enemy.

Whether or not a character's actions are justifiable or not does not determine their morality, in my opinion. :P That said, Zed is not Chaotic Evil, as Chaotic means no rhyme or reason, or without restraint. Whereas, Lawful evil would not be fitting either, as he seems to have no set code for his actions. I'd say Zed would be Neutral Evil. However, that's just my opinion, and a counterarguement could always be made for Chaotic Evil as well. Without more details it is hard to determine an exact position. :P
i feel like Yi could have fit in with a neon green and lucian a neon blue color
PROJECT: Chromapack

Yeah I agree with you. Fiora adds good color diversity within that group of skins, as does zed being red. I feel like they should have had more variation with the other skins as well, its kind of weird to just have fiora be the odd one out and have everyone else but zed and her be yellow-orange. I still love the skins though and bought two as the skins are still super cool.

I have to agree. I felt that it was right for Leona to be teh sunny Yellow she has but there was a lack of coloration choice for Yi, Yasuo and Lucian. Lucian would have been fine with a more muted orange perhaps while a bright in your face orange for Yi leaving the supa yellow for Leona. As you all stated Fiora and Zed add that extra color to the group. While Yasuo should have likely been a green or greenish yellow instead of what they chose for him.
Still waiting on PROJECT: Taric...{{champion:44}}
Dear god no.
Dear Gems, yes.

Man...and here i was hoping {{champion:131}}  would finally get in on something else other then another moon skin. But looked over again while {{champion:89}} gets ANOTHER skin. Q.Q darn Solari lovers! Not only is {{champion:131}} shunned in lore but by riot also >.<

What'ed be kewl is if they had "Operation" skins which were mostly white instead of black and were the enemies of the "Projecct" skins. They could'a had Operation Thresh, Operations Diana, Operation Riven, Operation Jax (idk any enemy of Fiora...) and Operation Shen, although he has a operation skin as a doctor.

Still waiting on Pulsefire J4
*Waiting for Ao Shin*
So where does full metal Jayce fit into all of this?
In the timeline where Viktor created the Battlecast army, Jayce created the full metal army to fight him.
WE NEED AN ALCHEMIST CHAMP, AND A FULL METAL SKIN ON RELEASE
Welcome to the champion spotlight for "Edwardo Elrock", the entirely steel alchemist.
Im waiting for you guys to make the 6v6v6 map so the battles between these teams will happen.

Okay,so you guys explain the difference between PROJECT,Mecha & Battlecast.What about the "Full Metal" skin line ({{champion:126}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:33}})?How is this skin line different from the other 3?

Ahem, the Steel legion, pulsefire, and full metal skins are part of the rebel army against Viktor's battlecast army in the same timeline. They're still alive, just under many layers of metal like the rest of the rebels.
WHY NOT MAKE A PROJECT SHEN :D

As much as I hate the champion, I think that PROJECT: Riven would be quite good; the change in sword when she ults would be quite natural. I'd like to see a project shen because i love the champ, but I don't think it would work very well. :(
She did just get Arcade Riven though :/
why not all project skins for the ninja group? eg: zed, shen, akali and kennen.

project: {{champion:44}} 

yes please :^)

One thing that would be incredibly interesting to see is a special large map or smaller map either 6v6 ready or 4v4 ready that is using the theme of the cyber punk era. It would match with Ekko's background, the Mecha skin line, Battlecast skin line, and Project skin line easily plus it could be located in Piltover which is considered one of the most technologically advanced places in Runeterra if I got my lore right.

I love the Project Vs. Battlecast Ideas as I play Viktor alot, and I especially love how you made the skin colors go down the color circle. I don't know if it was done purposefully, or not, but if you guys are onna expand the line up, continue the color circle!

Thanks for making this free awesome game that everyone is able to play. Thanks for making this great community.
